description:
Conan, Mitsuhiko, and Genta accompany Ayumi to the park where she found a bracelet. On the road facing the park are what appear to be tire marks from a vehicle that suddenly departed as well as bloodstains. In order to return the bracelet to its owner, the Detective Boys visit various accessory shops, which eventually leads them to a certain person, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Lost Article That Smells Like a Case
Un objet trouvé à l`odeur du crime
العنصر المفقود الذي يبدو كرائحة قضية
落とし物は事件のにおい
